price: 11. Ya soló, tango mayi etondaki, biso nde tomatisaki bino okati ya masuwa.
arabic: إِنَّا لَمَّا طَغَا ٱلۡمَآءُ حَمَلۡنَٰكُمۡ فِي ٱلۡجَارِيَةِ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: innā lammā ṭaghā al-māu ḥamalnākum fī al-jāriyati
